verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I want to know You, Lord
Like I know a friend
I want to know You, Lord

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
So I'm laying down
All my religion
I'm laying down
I want to know You, Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I used to think
That I could box You in
But I'm laying down
I want to know You, Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord, I've been told
To be ashamed
Lord, I've been told
I don't measure up
Lord, I've been told
I'm not good enough
But You're here with me

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
I reach out,
And You
Find me in the dust
And You say no amount
Of untruths can separate us

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
I will rejoice
In the simple gospel
I will rejoice
In You, Lord
